org.forgerock.openam.license

Interface User

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConsoleUser

    public interface User
    Simple interface for interacting with a user during click-through licensing. Allows for easy mocking of user interaction for unit testing.
    Since:
    12.0.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String ask(String questionId)
      Asks the user the given question and returns their answer as a string.
      String getMessage(String messageId)
      Get a localised message for display to this user.
      String getName()
      Gets the name of the user.
      void show(String message)
      Directly shows a non-localised (or already localised) message to the user.
      void tell(String messageId)
      Displays the given message to the user, localised to their language/locale.

    • Method Detail

      • tell

        void tell(String messageId)
        Displays the given message to the user, localised to their language/locale.
        Parameters:
        messageId - the id of the localised message to display.

      • show

        void show(String message)
        Directly shows a non-localised (or already localised) message to the user.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to display verbatim.

      • ask

        String ask(String questionId)
        Asks the user the given question and returns their answer as a string.
        Parameters:
        questionId - the message id of a question to ask the user.
        Returns:
        the response as a string, or null if the user has disconnected.

      • getName

        String getName()
        Gets the name of the user.
        Returns:
        the name of the user.

      • getMessage

        String getMessage(String messageId)
        Get a localised message for display to this user.
        Parameters:
        messageId - the id of the message to get.
        Returns:
        the localised message.
